title: Collaborative Learning Design Based on Augmented, Virtual, and Mixed Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Collaborative Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Language training course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, utilizing real-time online collaboration tools in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners complete at least 80% of language tasks (translation, negotiation simulations, etc.) using collaborative tools in AR/VR/MR environments.
Learners can evaluate peer feedback-based problem-solving skills in scenarios incorporating mixed reality technology.
Learners identify at least three technical limitations in designing virtual collaborative spaces and propose alternatives.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
